description: Shows whether an app can be cloned to another resource group or subscription.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

subscription_id.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

blockingfeatures.description: List of features enabled on app that prevent cloning.

unsupportedfeatures.description: List of features enabled on app that are non-blocking but cannot be cloned. The app can still be clonedbut the features in this list will not be set up on cloned app.
